channel.title: development on LaRoccx
channel.description: Recent content in development on LaRoccx

item.title: Bash Scripting Syntax
item.description: This article servers more or less as a personal reminder and not a detailed user guide to getting started with Bash scripting. It does however include most of the syntax required to create Bash scripts.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
